## getInUnsafe variable

Unchecked version of . Returns `undefined` if path is invalid.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getInUnsafe: <T = any>(state: any, path: Path) => T | undefined
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` can be used to indicate the type of the nested value to be retrieved (default: `any`<!-- -->).

## Example


```ts
getInUnsafe({ a: { b: { c: 23 } } }, "a.b.c");
// 23

```
